context.project_type: Personal résumé website – two-section layout (Hero + Projects/Contact)
non_negotiables: Maintain existing two-section structure and overall page height
No major overhaul; focus on polished, incremental improvements
Use new dark palette (#232533, #323445, #2c2e3e) + light accent (#ebeaed ± variations)
Keep hover animations but remove color-filter overlays on cards
Prevent pinch-zoom across devices (using viewport meta & touch-action)
Vertically centre 'About' between Hero and Contact on desktop
deliverables: Updated CSS variables + small stylesheet refactors
Zero direct git commits; output only patch-ready code + changelog

tasks: Replace current 5-color variables with new palette tokens.
Map old variables to new ones; ensure text contrast ≥ WCAG AA.
Introduce missing --bg-primary, --bg-secondary, --fg-primary vars where needed.
Output before/after diff snippet for :root block.
Parse stylesheet; flag duplicates, unused selectors, legacy comments.
Consolidate media queries (≤480px / ≤768px / landscape) by merging rules.
Convert fixed pixel paddings/margins to var(--spacing-*) where feasible.
Remove color-filter on .card:hover while keeping translate/box-shadow animation.
Add subtle parallax or scroll-reveal effects with prefers-reduced-motion fallback.
Inject touch-action: manipulation and viewport user-scalable=no to disable zoom.
Ensure interactions remain keyboard/ARIA accessible.
Audit breakpoints on real devices (DevTools emulation + web references).
Fine-tune font-size scaling, container widths, and tap targets.
Vertically centre About card between Hero & Contact on ≥1024 px width.
Output CSS overrides or utility classes.
Collect open-source résumé sites & dark-theme templates for reference.
Gather CSS clamp typography scales and GSAP scroll progress snippets.
Provide annotated links and copy-ready code samples.
Run aXe-core (or similar) against updated pages.
Flag contrast violations or tabindex issues introduced by other agents.
Suggest aria-labels / semantic tweaks.

pipeline: DesignAgent → updates palette using snippets when helpful
CleanupAgent & MobileAgent → run in parallel on updated CSS
InteractionAgent → update JS/CSS, consult MobileAgent for touch behaviour
AccessibilityAgent → final pass; open tickets for blocking issues
forbidden_actions: Any modification that expands section count or base viewport height

- Contrast issues in footer links (WCAG AA)
### Removed
- Duplicate .skill-tag definitions
